duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to acquire new business and maximize revenue.
Build a book of residual income through proactive outreach and lead generation activities.
Prioritize opportunities and manage multiple touch points to drive outcomes and achieve sales targets.
Engage in face-to-face sales meetings, networking events, and industry conferences to build and expand the client portfolio.
Maintain client relationships for future revenue growth and renewal, focusing on compelling and persuasive communication.
Utilize a custom CRM platform to optimize client acquisition and retention efforts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field (Master's preferred)
